preparation: Join all ingredients except 1 tsp of salt, cheese and toppings and kneed till uniform, then let rest for 1-24h.
Sprinkle flour on the dough and spread it into a circle and fold the borders.
Add the tomato sauce with the extra salt, then cheese and toppings.
Preheat the oven to 450F and put the pizza in it. Let it bake until the crust is golden brown.
